text: Akash Pandurang Fundkar is a member of the 13th Maharashtra Legislative Assembly. He represents the Khamgaon Assembly Constituency. He belongs to the Bharatiya Janata Party. He is the son of BJP politician Pandurang Pundalik Fundkar. ==Within BJP== *State Vice President, Maharashtra BJYM (2009-2014) ==References== Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2014–2019 Category:People from Buldhana district Category:Marathi politicians Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Maharashtra Category:Living people Category:1983 births Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2019–
title: Akash Pandurang Fundkar
